Description: This is a translation model from Catalan into Romanian, Italian, and Occitan that was part of the submission for WMT21 Multilingual Low-Resource Translation for Indo-European Languages Shared Task.#SEPThe model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.

This is a translation model from Catalan Occitan that was part of the submission for WMT21 Multilingual Low-Resource Translation for Indo-European Languages Shared Task.#SEPThe model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.

This is a neural machine translation model for Catalan to Occitan translation and constitutes the primary CUNI submission for WMT21 Multilingual Low-Resource Translation for Indo-European Languages Shared Task.#SEPThe model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.

This is a neural machine translation model for Catalan to Occitan translation. It is a multi-task model, also producing phonemic transcription of the Catalan source. The model was submitted to WMT21 Multilingual Low-Resource Translation for Indo-European Languages Shared Task as a CUNI-Contrastive system for Catalan to Occitan.#SEPThe model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.

Corpus: Czech image captioning, machine translation, sentiment analysis and summarization (Neural Monkey models)
Description: These models are for the Neural Monkey toolkit for Czech and English, solving four NLP tasks: machine translation, image captioning, sentiment analysis, and summarization. The models are trained on standard datasets and achieve state-of-the-art or near state-of-the-art performance in the tasks. The same models can also be invoked via an online demo.#SEPThis entry also includes models for automatic news summarization for Czech and English. The Czech models were trained using the SumeCzech dataset, while the English models were trained using the CNN-Daily Mail corpus, using the standard recurrent sequence-to-sequence architecture.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.
These English-Czech translation models are used by the .#SEPThe model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.

These Czech to English translation models are trained on the parallel CzEng 1.6 corpus. The data is tokenized with Moses). Alignment is done using fast_align and the standard Moses pipeline is used for training. #SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.
These are CUBBITT English-French translation models available in the LINDAT translation service.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.
These English-German translation models are used by the Lindat translation service.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.

These are English-German translation models available in the LINDAT translation service. The models are trained using the MCSQ social surveys dataset (available here ). #SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.

Corpus: GreynirT2T Serving - En--Is NMT Inference and Pre-trained Models (1.0)
Description: This CLARIN-IS repository entry includes code and models required to run the GreynirT2T Transformer NMT system for translation between English and Icelandic.#SEPThe models along with the code are available for download from the CLARIN-IS repository.
These are CUBBITT English-Polish translation models available in the LINDAT translation service.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.
These are CUBBITT English-Russiantranslation models available in the LINDAT translation service.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.

These are English-Russian translation models available in the LINDAT translation service. The models are trained using the MCSQ social surveys dataset (available here ). #SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.

Corpus: GreynirTranslate - mBART25 NMT (with layer drop) models for Translations between Icelandic and English (1.0)
Description: These are a variant of GreynirTranslate - mBART25 NMT models for Translations between Icelandic and English (1.0), trained with a 40% layer drop. They are suitable for inference using every other layer for optimized inference speed with lower translation performance.#SEPThese models are available for download from the repository of CLARIN-IS.
